\px[400] Kou! You're here! I thought you died!

\px[400] No way. You know I never leave a trace.

\px[340] Interesting deduction. You'd make a great detective.
\px[420] Hey, are you sure you can read that?
\px[300] Huh.\| I just realized you can speak the language clearly now.
\px[410] You finally grew out of the alphabet...
\px[250] You're taking so long to read your file...\|uh\|, you can't read yet can you?
\px[300] ...\w[30] oh. \w[30]You're family was ki... how come you never told me?
\px[380] ... do you still want me to read it? \| Alright.
\px[190] It says here your family was a victim of an organization from... \fithe Underworld??!
\px[200] It's not a place. It's a system of the most dangerous groups in the country!
\px[390] What's the organization's name? Tell me.
\px[200] Right there. Read it? That's the most dangerous of them all. I hear that they -
\px[290]Eh? \w[30] Hey, where are you going? Di-did I say something wrong?
\px[250] \fbKou?! \|\fr*curses* \|I can't keep covering for you! I told you to \fistop\fr this!

\px[200] You were rescued from them at a young age, but the family that saved you

\px[450] All the more reason to end them.
\px[250] I'm doing you a favor too. I'm ridding this world of \fbbastards\fr, \fidetective.
\px[350] Wh- You still don't get it??! \w[30] It's all meaningless!
\px[400] You're doing the same thing \fithey\fr did!!
\px[180] You're wasting you're life on the past!! You're just trapping yourself in an endless -

\px[430] It's a pain to carry it all on my back.
\px[470] I know I can't live like this.
\px[400] But there's too many that need to \fbdie.
